name: Battlemage

abilities.name: Storm Call
abilities.description: Pick up to 3 adversaries nearby. Each of them suffers 1 Wound.

abilities.name: Mysctic Shield
abilities.description: Put the hero dice here until the end of the round. While it is there, add 1 to any save rolls for the Battlemage and any other heroes in the same chamber.

renown: If you use both Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield actions in a turn, gain 1 renown.
